ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The course gave a comprehensive overview of the scholarship and issues in the field of manuscript studies. It was particularly helpful in that we were introduced to paleography, and had the opportunity to do a codicological examination of a manuscript in the Beinecke. I would recommend the course to aspiring specialists who need to broaden their knowledge of the history of Byzantine art, though it might not appeal to people with only general interest, as the issues discussed were quite particular to the field.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Both the general knowledge of the field and the practical skills learned will undoubtedly be helpful in my research.
